ref_item.measure: Number of Participants With Readmission at 30 Days
ref_item.description: How many subjects were readmitted to the hospital

pred_item.description: Safety of the app, as assessed by 30-day all-cause hospital readmission. Planned or unplanned hospitalization within an MGB hospital with documentation of date within 30 days was used for readmission rates.

ref_item.measure: Number of Participants With Readmission at 90 Days
ref_item.description: How many subjects were readmitted to the hospital

pred_item.description: All-cause hospital readmission within 90 days post-PCI. Planned or unplanned hospitalization within an MGB hospital with documentation of date within 90 days was used for readmission rates.

ref_item.measure: Number of Participants Enrolled in Clinic-based Cardiac Rehab at 90 Days
ref_item.description: Percent of patients discharged after intervention who attend at least one session of clinic-based cardiac rehab

pred_item.measure: Enrollment in cardiac rehabilitation (CR) within 90 days
pred_item.description: Enrollment in cardiac rehabilitation at an MGB site within 90 days of hospitalization.
